titles.title: To eliminate the numerical limitation on the number of aliens granted asylum who may become lawful permanent residents in any fiscal year.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 3/1/2000--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to eliminate the cap on aliens eligible to adjust status from asylee to permanent resident in any fiscal year.
